title: Highlight: Highlight() constructor
summary:
The Highlight() constructor returns a newly created
  Highlight object which can hold a collection of Range objects to be styled using the CSS Custom Highlight API.
pageTitle: Highlight: Highlight() constructor - Web APIs | MDN
